Welcome to the homepage for the APT (Algorithms: Practice and Theory) seminar! This is a virtual fortnightly seminar series, where we discuss recent advancements in the field of algorithms and complexity, from perspectives of both theory and practice. 

::: {.callout}
<i class="fa-regular fa-calendar"></i> We meet over Zoom at 20:00IST every alternate Wednesday. Find out how you can [stay updated](seminars.qmd).
:::

We also welcome you to suggest a seminar! Feel free to sign yourself up, or someone you want to hear, or just share a topic that you want to learn about. You can do this by sending an email to `aptseminars@gmail.com`.
